summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Bagley Avenue from north Forty-first Street to the north line of Baltimore Addition et al in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing under Ordinance No. 17684, creating Local Improvement District No. 1670 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
